Interpretation A dream about live fish by Ibn Sirinama. Interpretation of a dream about live fish? Experts say that live fish in a dream have a different interpretation depending on the gender of the dreamer and some circumstances surrounding him. For example, if he is a man and sees a beautiful and colorful fish, this is a sign of his relationship with a beautiful and distinguished woman with a distinctive and impressive beauty. If someone sees many live fish in front of him in a dream, then there are multiple paths of life waiting for him in his reality, whether at work, or In children, or in relation to close and beloved people. If a person suffering from the disease finds a fish in his bed, the vision is interpreted very poorly for that person, because his condition may worsen and he will find himself in a more difficult situation, and God knows best. If the dreamer goes to catch these fish from the sea Or the river, it means that he is a strong and persistent person who plans his goals and plans them with great skill and will achieve them in the end. Some say that if the dreamer is able to catch and collect live fish, then there is a possibility that he will be able to rise to the working position in his work, that is, to rise in his work. And he succeeds in a well. . - A worthy method. If you catch a fish and find that it does not contain scales, then you are most likely a person who lies to and deceives many people in life in order to reach your personal comfort and goals and you must abandon these bad habits. If a man finds that in front of him are four fish with beautiful and attractive colors, then the dream means that he will communicate or marry four girls, and God knows best. Seeing a dead fish for a person does not It is good, but rather it is a warning of the many enemies and the many evils that come from them. The fishing sequence indicates success in life, great patience in achieving desires, and the stable and strong qualities present in the dreamer’s personality, and Ibn Sirin considers it to be one of the happy dreams for the dreamer. If a woman finds that she is cooking fish While it is alive, it will be a good personality with good qualities, in addition to the presence of many good things that will increase it and bless it, God willing. With development, many questions related to In the world of dreams, scientists have been able to answer many of the mysteries and secrets of dreams. But the dominant question remains about how to control dreams and whether anyone can dream of what they want. Given what dreams are, they are events, images, and people. In fact, the subconscious mind deals with them. Then he translates them into scenes that a person sees during his sleep. This confirms to us that contacting the subconscious mind, or what is called in psychology the subconscious, is the only way to control dreams. This is done through specific steps that are repeated over a period of time until you reach positive results. You can communicate with Your subconscious mind through complete relaxation and deep breathing. Just as meditation works magic on the subconscious mind, you can also practice yoga or spend some time in the calendar. See also: Dreams that indicate magic. How do I dream about what I want? It is clear to us from the above that controlling dreams requires practice and training, Because you will not be able to control your dreams overnight. This takes a long time and here are the most important steps to help you see what you want in your dream: Meditation: You need to spend enough time meditating, it is said that you go to sleep. This is to clear your mind of events and situations that have been stuck with it Throughout the day. To ensure a peaceful, restful sleep and a vivid dream that is easy to interpret. Visualization: This is done by drawing a clear picture in your imagination of the place you want to see. Composing a complete scene in terms of people, conversations, emotions, and sounds. Continue imagining this scene for as long as possible before sleeping. Placing dream signs next to your sleeping place: Psychologists say that placing a physical object is related to what you would like to see next to you while sleeping. It is very helpful to recall this in your dreams. Here are some examples: If you want to see a specific person in a dream, you should think about him and the memories you have collected. Then put his picture next to your pillow before you fall asleep. If you cannot solve a difficult arithmetic problem, you can write it on a piece of paper. And put it next to you before To sleep, you may see some ways to solve it in the morning. If you want to design a unique painting, you need to imagine some ideas and draw them on a white sheet of paper. Then you fold the paper and put it under your pillow. Sleeping in the dark: Psychologists say that sleeping in a dark room extinguishes All lights. So that a person does not see a difference in the dark when he opens or closes his eyes. One of the things that enhances a person’s ability to control his dreams. How to program dreams.
